pageContent: Background: A phase 3 multicenter trial demonstrated that magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)-guided focused ultrasound (US) is a safe, noninvasive treatment that alleviated pain from bone metastases. However, outcomes varied among institutions (from 0%-100% treatment success).

metaData.source:
High-intensive focused ultrasound in localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10795622/
